name: A Big Mood (For A Little Bit More)
name_original: A Big Mood (For A Little Bit More)
description:
A Big Mood (For A Little Bit More) is a GMless live-action game for two or more players about romantic and/or sexual expectations, tensions, and things left unsaid. Players create a scene, and then blow a bubble or throw a feather up in the air. The scene continues until the bubble pops or the feather hits the floor.

Submission (heh) to Strawberry Jam 3.
